NewsArticle.Title: Nexon Resolved Relay Connection
NewsArticle.Content:
At 5 p.m. PST, 2001/11/09, we resolved a poor connection to Dark Ages game server. We apologize for the problems caused during service relay, which became severe for a portion of players on the evening of 11/08 and afternoon of 11/09. If you were unable to connect or experienced a slow connection, then please try to connect at this time.
If you try again now and are still unable to connect, then please report your exact symptom
